explains: n. 肤色，气色；概貌，局势

sentences.en: My complexion remained pale and pasty.
sentences.cn: 我的脸色依旧苍白憔悴。

sentences.en: She has a poor complexion and pockmarks on her forehead.
sentences.cn: 她面色不佳，额头上有一些麻子。

sentences.en: Rain water was once considered to be good for the complexion.
sentences.cn: 雨水曾一度被认为对肤色有益。
